mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS id, m.email AS email, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.content AS content FROM comments c JOIN members m ON c.author_id = m.user_id WHERE c.attraction_id = #{attractionId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT c.comment_id AS id, c.attraction_id AS attractionId, a.title AS attractionName, a.first_image1 AS image, c.content AS content, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM comments c JOIN attractions a ON c.attraction_id = a.no WHERE c.author_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
